post.text: For 30 years, Hillary Clinton has done NOTHING but deliver terrible policies that have made us less safe and less prosperous -- what a failure! As President, I promise to always put the American people FIRST. On day one, believe me, you will see the REAL CHANGE our country needs to win again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Dakota
comment.text: Vote Trump not because of candidate preference, but because you want the next generation to inherit something other than a nuclear wasteland.

replies.author: Devon
replies.text: Here is a idea.. don't vote. They both lie

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: Hahaha nuclear codes in hillarys hands I will definitely pass . And since you like ary some refugees need a place to stay sue why don't you let them stay at your house .. hahaha
